sentences.en: Complete Test Requisition Form firstly before any test application.
sentences.cn: 申请测试需要填写《委托测试申请表》.

sentences.en: Ensure adequate of supplies , materials , and requisition for general supplies.
sentences.cn: 确保有足够的用品, 并申请所需采购的物品.

sentences.en: Get purchase requisition from each department and release purchase order after approval.
sentences.cn: 接收各部门的采购需求,经批准后下发采购订单.

sentences.en: He and his books were in frequent requisition as to property confiscated and made national.
sentences.cn: 他和他的册籍屡屡被调去检查收归国有的财产.

sentences.en: Inspect orders, invoices and requisitions; fill stock requisition orders.
sentences.cn: 检查定单, 发票及采购申请; 填制库存需求定单.

sentences.en: It took a moonlight requisition to get the medicine we needed.
sentences.cn: 趁着夜色偷袭,我们获得了所需要的药品.

sentences.en: Secondly, the controversial decision to expand the land requisition by the scope.
sentences.cn: 其次, 建议扩大征地争议裁决的受案范围.

sentences.en: The army requisition all the truck to carry supplies.
sentences.cn: 军队征用了所有卡车,目的是为了运输车需品.

sentences.en: The authorities often requisition land for highways.
sentences.cn: 当局常因筑路之需而征用土地.

sentences.en: The building was requisitioned as a military hospital for the duration of the war.
sentences.cn: 这座大楼在战争期间被征用为军用医院。

sentences.en: The commercial requisition of land should be compensated in marketing price.
sentences.cn: 商业性征地必须按市场价格补偿.

sentences.en: The soldiers made a requisition on the village for horses.
sentences.cn: 士兵们在村子里征用马匹.

sentences.en: They will allocate funds to you if you requisition it.
sentences.cn: 如果你提出书面申请,他们就会拨给你资金.

sentences.en: To analyze and understand the purchasing requisition and technical requirements.
sentences.cn: 分析、理解采购需求及技术要求.

sentences.en: To ensure requisition of goods necessary to the functioning of the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 根据沿线食品需求数量,保证供应.
我们通过征用获得了汽油.

words.tran_cn: 必备的，必不可少的；需要的
征用；要求；[法]申请书；引渡要求

phrases.tran_cn: 采购申请，进货申请书；请购单

trans.tran_cn: 征用，（财产或材料的正式）征用令，申请书
trans.tran_en: A requisition is a written document which allows a person or organization to obtain goods
if someone in authority, especially the army, requisitions a building, vehicle, or food, they officially demand to have it during an  emergency  such as a war
if someone in authority, especially the army, requisitions a building, vehicle, or food, they officially demand to have it during an  emergency  such as a war
